item.title: Depth World
item.description: 3D in OF # Everything we have done so far has been in two dimensions, using (x, y) for position, and [width, height] for size. Now that we’ve got data that also has depth, we can move into the third dimension to represent it. This means using (x, y, z) for position, and [width, height, depth] for size. By default, the openFrameworks canvas is set to 2D. The origin (0, 0) is in the top-left, and values increase as we move right and down.
